Social And Cultural Activities: Welfare programme for the upliftment of Secheduled Castes, Secheduled Tribes and deprived sections of the society alongwith generating awareness of Indian culture of traditions
Other Information: Imprisoned in 1978 in a Jail Bharo Andolan under the leadership of late Smt. Indira Gandhi.
